oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Pee Wee King Show (proof)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Collins Sisters; Color separation; King, Pee Wee, 1914-2000; Metal photoplates; Stewart, Redd;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: One color window card fragment (blue on white) announcing The Pee Wee King Show featuring Pee Wee King with Redd Stewart and the Collins Sisters. The poster features the first application of color in what would have been a two color card. The poster contains metal photoplates of Pee Wee King and the Collins Sisters and is probably a proof.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:medium: fragments (object portions); posters; proofs (prints by function); window cards;
